jobs_results.title: Consultant / Senior Consultant - Cloud Engineering (Japan Collaboration) - SG1
jobs_results.via: via Jobs At Deloitte Southeast Asia - Deloitte
jobs_results.description:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.

Work you will do

We are seeking exceptional, highly skilled individuals to join Japanese Client Services / Japan SEA Collaboration as full time Director.

Recognizing the strong momentum of investment by Japanese companies’ in ASEAN, our Consulting groups in Southeast Asia and Japan launched a collaboration in 2012 to provide a wide range of business consulting services for over 100 Japanese clients across the region, including some of the biggest manufacturing companies in the world.

In response to the expansion of Japanese businesses... in Southeast Asia, there have been numerous collaboration initiatives between Deloitte Southeast Asia and Japan since 2012. Now there are over 100 consultants of diverse nationalities across the ASEAN region focusing on Japanese clients. We also have a joint training program for new consultants, and through the engagements with multinationals and ASEAN companies, we are able to build their capabilities and experience and provide our people with meaningful experiences, and a unique career path.

Enough about us, let's talk about you

If you are someone with:
• The right person will be detailed, highly technical, having 6+ years of current network infrastructure experience, preferably with Cloud integration from on premises networks
• AWS Certified or Google Cloud Certified
• 2+ years project experience migrating and deploying cloud based solutions (GCP, Azure or AWS)
• 2+ years architecting, implementing and supporting Network for Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services or Google Cloud Platform
• Experience with infrastructure as code is a must
• Experience with building, configuring and supporting network infrastructure solutions (on-premises, virtualization, Public Cloud) using both Linux/Unix and Windows with specific recommendations on server, load balancing, HA/DR, & storage architectures
• Technical proficiency including systems experience, strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills, and issue management in a multi-platform environment
• Experience with deploying cloud based solutions and workload migration strategy using tools
• Experience with Enterprise application and database architecture is an advantage
• Demonstrated skills in communication (oral, written, presentation), analysis, problem solving and short term and long term planning
• An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment.
• Proficiency in the Japanese language (Business Level) due to regional project requirements.

Next Steps

So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified

jobs_results.title: Legal Recruiter (Internship)
jobs_results.via: via SearchAsia Consulting Pte Ltd Is Hiring A Legal Recruiter ...
jobs_results.description:
Ever interested in understanding the process of hiring?

Passionate about learning more about the legal industry?

Open to networking and establishing connections between firms and talents in the legal industry?

Want to make an impact and change someone’s course of life?

Find out the Behind-The-Scenes of a legal recruitment firm through an internship with us, and experience a steep learning curve during this 3-months hands-on experience.

What can you take away from us?

· More comprehensive understanding of the legal industry

· Improved interpersonal and communication skills

· How to be resourceful and efficient

· To perform and prioritize under stress

· A real insight into, and personal experience with corporate life – life as a legal recruitment consultant

Responsibilities – of a legal recruiter

1. Recruitment

a. To actively source for potential candidates for different legal placements via many channels

b. Communicating with professionals in the legal industry who hold... managerial roles and above

2. Administrative

a. Posting of job advertisements

b. Data entry and documentations

c. Updating and maintenance of documents

Requirements:

· Minimum “A” Level Certification

· Minimum 3 months commitment

Our Preferred Skills:

· Driven and Self-motivated

· Willing to learn; open minded

· Cheerful personality

· Well-versed in MS Office

· Efficient at work

Kate Chang Chu Yan

EA License No.: 16S8107

EA Personnel Registration NO.: R1332479

Recruit Legal is the leading specialist legal recruitment consultancy in Asia. The firm's proven search process and broad industry and regional expertise has enabled successful placements to be made in Singapore, Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai and Jakarta. We have very quickly been recognized as one of the leading consultancies in the region, and we count top international law firms and global multinationals as our clients. Beginning as an informal unit in Recruit Express and formalized into an independent legal division in 2003, Recruit Legal has since 1996 provided legal recruitment services to a broad client base. Over the years, our consultants have gained considerable experience in the placement and procurement of mid-level and senior legal professionals. We continue to focus on the core legal markets in Asia-Pacific.

Our goal is to be recognized as the pre-eminent adviser providing a complete range of legal placement and procurement services to legal professionals and clients worldwide. Our focus is to facilitate the success of our business clients whilst enhancing the career opportunities of our candidates. We are committed to ensuring the 'right fit'. Our clients, which include multi-national corporations, international banks and leading international and local law firms, have benefited from our quality advice ranging from current market trends to mid-and high- level developments in the legal industry. We have offices in Singapore, Sydney, Kuala Lumpur and Taiwan, as well as partner network in Hong Kong, Shanghai and Japan. Our global reach ensures that we are poised to assist clients with a global reach, and candidates who wish to relocate overseas

jobs_results.title: Consultant

Expertise in course design and development for delivery through classroom facilitation, blended, workplace-base, workplace and e-learning. Provide training and coaching to Academy's Staff IQC Teams. Provide training and development consultancy for new and on-going projects undertaken by Academy. Job Requirements: Consultant shall be a professional in adult education with at least three (3) years of relevant curriculum design Consultant must have experience in course design and development exposure in a Polytechnic and WSQ type of courses and have been successful in submitting courses for accreditation with SSG (formerly WDA). Consultant shall be ACTA and DACE certified.

jobs_results.title: Consultant, Network
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities:
• Technical expert in one or more technologies.
• Member of Tier 2 Incident Management team. (incident management, incident review and root cause analysis)
• Receiving and resolving complex issues and meeting customer needs.
• Work with customers from around the world.
• Required to perform 24x7 shift duties and with occasional standby for ad-hoc activities.
• Continually learn about in-depth networking issues and strive to achieve excellence
• Liaise and coordinate with SingTel Business Units and Overseas Telco on service level maintenance.
• Liaise with vendors to troubleshoot Customer Premise Equipment such as routers and switches (Cisco & Juniper).
• Technical escalation point Global Corporate Customers, internal operations staff and SingTel Global Office on service maintenance.
• Escalate to Tier 3 for any new issues and issues without known solutions.

Requirements :
• Degree in Telecommunication or Computer Science or Computer Engineering or Diploma with... relevant experience.
• Good team player with excellent communications skills.
• Need to possess good attitude towards understanding customer requirement and understanding the issues clearly.
• Must be customer oriented and be able to handle difficult situations.
• Expertise in IP Routing protocols such as BGP/OSPF/ISIS etc.
• Expertise in MPLS and WAN & Ethernet technologies.
• Expertise in QoS and Traffic Engineering.
• At least 6 years of relevant experience in the IT/Telco industry supporting ISP/Large Enterprise
• Possess industry standard certifications such as CCNP/CCIP/JNCIP/JNCIS
• Knowledge of ITIL processes and methodologies. Good to have ITILv3 certification.
• Hands on expertise in Juniper, Cisco routers and switches

jobs_results.title: Senior Consultant - Information Security (BB-87070)
jobs_results.description: Company description Sia Partners is a specialist management consulting firm which was initially established in Paris, France in 1999 and has grown into a global firm with approximately 1,400 employees and revenue exceeding $230m. Our culture is strongly orientated towards high quality expertise and delivering excellent results and outcomes for our clients which include a wide range of multinational companies.We have a global reach with integrated teams based in 23 locations, including London, Paris, New York, Montreal, Dubai, Hong-Kong, Tokyo and Singapore. The specialist services we offer include Digital Transformation, Operational Excellence, Change Management, Smart Automation and Data Science.After several years of significant growth in Asia, we are continuing to expand our business and are looking for talented and self-motivated Consultants in Singapore, Hong-Kong and Tokyo. Job description Due to our exceptional growth in Asia, we are looking for a Senior Consultant specialized... in Information Security to join our team in Singapore. As a Senior Consultant, you will help to build our expertise and guarantee the quality of delivery to ensure market-leading practices for our Singapore office, taking into account the global nature of our organization and our clients.SENIOR CONSULTANT - INFORMATION SECURITYSupervised by experienced consultants, you will help CISOs and Risk Managers of our customers by addressing the following needs:Definition, development and improvement of Information Security policies, guidelines and processesProject management Deployment of an Information Security Maturity assessmentAssist and improve Data Protection and Information Classification policies, guidelines and processes (including software tools)Information Security and Cyber Risk Management assessmentsAssistance in the deployment of IT security remediation programsProject management and assistance to deployment of Information Security programsIT Audit and Regulatory Compliance assessmentAssistance in the deployment of Information Security solutionsAnalysis and improvement of Identity and Access Management life cycleImprove and maintain Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery plans, including optimization of Crisis management processesAs part of the firm's internal activities, your participation revolves around the following areas:The development or strengthening of our offers through training sessions, working groups, internal and external distribution of marketing materialsSupport in the publication activities (sector blogs, articles, insights, etc.)Business development by contributing to the definition of needs and participating in commercial activities (development of pitches, responses to RFP, etc.) Qualifications Ideally you have 4 - 5 years of relevant consulting experience, and have worked in Information Security related projects within the Consulting and/or Financial Services industry.At least one certification on Information Security (e.g. CISSP, CISA etc.)Engineering and/or Management graduates from top universities and business schools are within our radar. Master degree in Information Systems Management or similar is highly appreciated.Teamwork, autonomy, entrepreneurial and analytical skills are your strengths. You will join a highly motivating professional environment where you will be asked to deliver continuously to ensure high quality and customer satisfaction. Presentation and communication skills are key.Strong ability to work with MS PowerPoint and MS Excel is a must. Programming skills are highly appreciated.YOUR EXPECTATIONSThis will be the right role for you if:You would like to be involved in more challenging projects with leading banks and financial institutionsYou would like to be more client-facing and have autonomy in your roleYou would like to be part of a dynamic, multi-cultural and fast-growing teamYou would like to grow your career with a company that is performance drivenWe will only shortlist candidates with eligible working visa in Singapore. Singaporeans/Singapore PR highly preferred

jobs_results.title: Big Data Engineer/ Consultant
jobs_results.description:
About Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Role Summary:

Do you have a pulse on new technologies and a desire to change the way business gets done? Do you want to implement emerging solutions for some of the most successful companies around? If you answered yes to these questions and you are passionate about helping clients effectively manage... enormous amounts of data to generate knowledge and value, then we want to meet you!

There will never be a typical day at Accenture Applied Intelligence, but that’s why people love it here. The opportunities to make a difference within exciting client initiatives are unlimited in the ever-changing digital landscape.
• Understand our customers' core business objectives and build end-to-end data centric solutions to address them
• Collaborate with technical business analyst, to understand business requirements, data, and optimize data pipeline performance.
• Build solutions in big data and data management tools meeting projects’ requirements
• Construct code with good coding standard and practices to ensure high quality and minimum risks
• Closely working with project manager and technical leads to provide regular status reporting and support them to identify blockers for quick resolution

Capacity & Performance Management / Tuning, Proven experience in delivering Automations, Service Improvements Area
Certification: Certified in SAP Basis or SAP HANA Requirements: Supporting and mentoring the L1, L2 and L3 Team... in day-to-day work.
Leading a team of 5-10 or 10+ persons.
Experience in running operations with ITIL processes / ITIL certified.
Excellent Analytical and troubleshooting skill. Interested candidates kindly submit your updated CV in Word Format to: jasmin@techcomsolutions.net. Only shortlisted candidates will be notify. Thank you

jobs_results.title: Senior Pega Developer
jobs_results.description:
My client is in the global MNC that is the leader in the market. We are looking for Senior Pega Developer to join the team due to increased in project demand and expansion plan. This is a permanent role and you can look forward to involve in enterprise scale systems and a competitive package.
Responsibilities:
• Involve in delivery of end to end software development life cycle
• Ensure scability of the product, backend infrastructure is ready and proper architecture design
• Drive the delivery of global components and solutions, design and integrate them in various stages of software development life cycle
• Delivering new features or products and help them focus to build awesome products
• Collaborate across cross locations IT teams in delivering software components
Experience:
• Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related
• Hands-on server-side application development experience in Pega, or Java languages
• Strong knowledge in webservices such as SOAP... 1.2, WSDL 2.0 and XML 1.0
• Pega certification is ideal (SA/SSA), and exposure on Pega PRPC BPM platform
• Working experience with Agile methodologies
• Excellent communication skills and ability in liaising with counterpart team based across APAC region
This is a very stable environment and you will be focus on enterprise level system architecture. Interested candidates please send across your updated CV to my email at j.chua@frgconsulting.com to find out more!
